@ChrisFerdinandi @Netlify Not currently. There are some simple options though. You can use https://t.co/lXJNAaB9wv as a cron to hit your build hook every hour (as I do each minute(!) for this: https://t.co/JPTKhBI57B ) Or you can schedule tasks via the @zapier integration: https://t.co/MITInQgypM
